src:
Griezmann dan Coutinho: Dibeli Sama Mahalnya dan Berujung Kegagalan?
05 Nov 2019, 09:51 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Philippe Coutinho menjadi bukti bahwa pemain yang dibeli dengan harga mahal belum tentu sukses di Barcelona. Nah, kini ancaman serius juga sedang mengintai pembelian mahal lain: Antoine Griezmann.
Pindahnya Neymar menuju ke PSG telah membuat Barcelona berjibaku di bursa transfer. Sejumlah pemain mahal harus dibeli untuk menutup lubang di lini serang yang ditinggalkan pemain asal Brasil tersebut.
Pasca Neymar, pembelian pertama yang dilakukan Barcelona yakni Ousmane Dembele. Pemain asal Prancis dibeli dengan harga 105 juta euro. Dembele sejauh ini belum mampu konsisten tetapi masih dipertahankan karena faktor usia yang muda.
Setelah itu, pada Januari 2018, klub asal Catalan membelai Philippe Coutinho. Pemain asal Brasil dibeli dengan harga 120 juta euro dari Liverpool. Lalu, pada Juli 2019, Barcelona membeli Antoine Griezmann dengan harga 120 juta euro dari Atletico Madrid.
text:
Griezmann and Coutinho: Purchased at the same price and lead to failure?
05 Nov 2019, 09:51 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Philippe Coutinho is proof that players bought at high prices are not necessarily successful in Barcelona. Now, a serious threat is also lurking about another expensive purchase: Antoine Griezmann.
Neymar's move to PSG has made Barcelona struggling in the transfer market. A number of expensive players must be purchased to cover the hole in the attack line left by the Brazilian.
After Neymar, the first purchase made by Barcelona was Ousmane Dembele. The Frenchman was bought for 105 million euros. Dembele has not been able to be consistent so far but is still maintained because of the young age factor.
After that, in January 2018, the Catalan club stroked Philippe Coutinho. The Brazilian was bought for 120 million euros from Liverpool. Then, in July 2019, Barcelona bought Antoine Griezmann for 120 million euros from Atletico Madrid.
